table_of_contents.title: The Great Lakes and the Wright family
George Wallace and Alberta B. (Jones) Wright

Addenda. Walter Wright: ancestors, altercation, will ; Salem Witch Trials, imprisonment, hanging ; Cummings, Gibson ancestors ; Searls, Manley ancestors ; Proof outlines ; Drone, Kohl ancestors ; Patent, Opera, 3 allied family charts ; Boese, O'Brien family.

subtitle: Walter and Susannah Wright ; nine generations and allied families for one line of descent and their lives, loves, labors, and travels in New England, New York, Wisconsin, Missouri, and Illinois
title: Wright family

description.value: "The purpose of this book, Wright 1635-1953, is to present a previously unchronicled family line descended from Walter Wright of 1600s Andover, Massachusetts, and his wife Susannah Johnson. The chapters proceed through eight Wright generations from New England to New York, Wisconsin, Missouri, and Illinois"--Pref.

notes.value:
"Includes a Boese family supplement."

Includes bibliographical references and index.
